#summary Some Examples of how to use pyTumblr
#labels Phase-Implementation

Here a few short examples of how to implement pyTumblr

= Adding a regular text note =

{{{
import tumblr

email = "test@testing.com"
password = "password"

cTumblr = tumblr.CTumblr(email,password)

title = "Testing 1,2,3"
text = "The next ground shaking thought."

cTumblr.text(text, title)
}}}
